text: Alberto Lembo (28 July 1944 â€“ 22 February 2022) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Lega Nord and later the National Alliance. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1994 to 2001. Lembo was born in Zevio, Italy. Lembo died in Lonigo, Italy on 22 February 2022 at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths
title: Alberto Lembo
